meanings.definition: Relating to or characteristic of animals.
meanings.sent1: The zookeeper studied the animalian behavior of the monkeys.
meanings.sent2: The veterinarian provided care for various animalian species.
meanings.sent3: The animalian instincts of the cat led it to chase after a toy mouse.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was wild and animalian, echoing through the forest.
meanings.sent5: The artist captured the beauty of the animalian world in their paintings.

meanings.definition: Of or relating to the animal kingdom.
meanings.sent1: The documentary explored the animalian habitats of different species.
meanings.sent2: The researcher discovered new animalian species in the rainforest.
meanings.sent3: The animalian diversity of the ocean never ceased to amaze the biologist.
meanings.sent4: His movements on the dance floor were fluid and animalian, resembling a graceful predator.
meanings.sent5: The ancient cave paintings depicted scenes of animalian life in vivid detail.

meanings.definition: Having the characteristics of an animal.
meanings.sent1: The werewolf's transformation was a display of his animalian nature.
meanings.sent2: The feral growls were a clear sign of the animalian presence nearby.
meanings.sent3: The animalian strength of the bear was unmatched in the forest.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes held a primal, animalian intensity that captivated all who met her.
meanings.sent5: The warrior moved with an animalian grace, ready to pounce at any moment.
